rooms.description: Grand entrance hall accommodating wheelchair accessibility with ramps and a spacious layout.
Large living area featuring an open design to promote airflow and natural light, integrating Vastu elements of prosperity.
Spacious dining area adjoining the living room with a central table that respects Vastu guidelines for family unity.
Modern kitchen designed for accessibility and efficient workflow, adhering to local building norms.
Compact living space for servants with essential amenities and access to common areas.
Dedicated library with bookshelves, comfortable seating, and ample natural lighting following Vastu principles for knowledge and creativity.
Home office designed with ergonomic furniture and technology integration, ensuring wheelchair accessibility.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars and sufficient space for wheelchair maneuverability, in accordance with local regulations.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance gate ensuring easy access to the property.
Front door designed for ease of entry with automated systems if required.
